title: strArrMethod - last day of the school year

content.question: String[] testTwo = {"last", "day", "of", "the", "school", "year"};String[] resultTwo = strArrMethod(testTwo);How many times is the line labeled // Line 12 in the strArrMethod executed as a result of executing the code segment?

skill.text: 3.B: Determine the result or output based on code that contains data abstractions.
